successes.title: EverDock: Universal Dock for iPhone, iPad, and Android
successes.description: Stunning aluminum design. Single or dual dock. Works with Lightning, 30-pin, micro-USB. Works with or without a case.

Pledges.description: ***Early-bird Special*** Get the EverDock bead blasted and anodized in natural aluminum color (silver). Includes 1 EverDock with silicone protector, 1 micro-USB cable, and 2 cable adapters. Huge $30 savings from retail price of $69.

Get the EverDock bead blasted and anodized in Silver, Space Gray, or Gold. Includes 1 EverDock with silicone protector, 1 micro-USB cable, and 2 cable adapters. Huge $20 savings from retail price of $69.

***Early Bird Special*** Get the EverDock Duo bead blasted and anodized in natural aluminum color (silver). Includes 1 EverDock Duo with silicone protector, 2 micro-USB cables, and 3 cable adapters. Huge $30 savings from retail price of $89.

Get the EverDock Duo bead blasted and anodized in your choice of Silver, Space Gray, or Gold. Includes 1 EverDock Duo with silicone protector, 2 micro-USB cables, and 3 cable adapters. Huge $20 savings from retail price of $89.

Get the EverDock Two-Pack bead blasted and anodized in your choice of Silver, Space Gray, or Gold. Includes 2 EverDocks with silicone protector, 2 micro-USB cables, and 4 cable adapters. Huge $50 savings from retail price of $138.

Get the EverDock Combo bead blasted and anodized in your choice of Silver, Space Gray, or Gold. Includes 1 EverDock and 1 EverDock Duo with silicone protector, 3 micro-USB cables, and 5 cable adapters. Huge $50 savings from retail price of $158

Get the EverDock Duo Two-Pack bead blasted and anodized in your choice of Silver, Space Gray, or Gold. Includes 2 EverDock Duos with silicone protector, 4 micro-USB cables, and 6 cable adapters. Huge $50 savings from retail price of $178.

Get the EverDock Three-Pack bead blasted and anodized in your choice of Silver, Space Gray, or Gold. Includes 3 EverDocks with silicone protector, 3 micro-USB cables, and 6 cable adapters. Huge $70 savings from retail price of $207.

Get the EverDock Duo Three-Pack bead blasted and anodized in your choice of Silver, Space Gray, or Gold. Includes 3 EverDock Duos with silicone protector, 6 micro-USB cables, and 9 cable adapters. Huge $80 savings from retail price of $267.

Get the EverDock Combo Two-Pack bead blasted and anodized in your choice of Silver, Space Gray, or Gold. Includes 2 EverDocks and 2 EverDock Duos with silicone protector, 6 micro-USB cables, and 10 cable adapters. Huge $117 savings from retail price of $316.

Get the EverDock Combo Three-Pack bead blasted and anodized in your choice of Silver, Space Gray, or Gold. Includes 3 EverDocks and 3 EverDock Duos with silicone protector, 9 micro-USB cables, and 15 cable adapters. Huge $175 savings from retail price of $474.
